name: traceoff-monorepo
description: TraceOff - Share links without trackers - Flutter + Node/TS Monorepo

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:mobile
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:mobile
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:server && npm run test:api
scripts.test:api: cd server && npm start & sleep 5 && curl -f http://localhost:3000/health && curl -f -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/clean -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"url": "https://example.com?utm_source=test"}' && curl -f http://localhost:3000/api/strategies
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:mobile
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:server:fix && npm run lint:mobile:fix
scripts.clean: npm run clean:server && npm run clean:mobile
